description: doc: pull front page featured articles using new blog JSON feed

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

https://codereview.appspot.com/9288045/diff/5001/doc/root.html
File doc/root.html (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/9288045/diff/5001/doc/root.html#newcode118
doc/root.html:118: $(document).ready(function() {
On 2013/05/08 15:33:47, dsymonds wrote:
> or
> 
> $(function() {
>   ...
> });

Done.

https://codereview.appspot.com/9288045/diff/5001/doc/root.html#newcode129
doc/root.html:129: $('body').append('<script type="text/javascript" src="http://blog.golang.org/.json?jsonp=feedLoaded"><'+'/script>');
On 2013/05/08 15:33:47, dsymonds wrote:
> this is kinda clunky. jQuery has a nicer way to build a DOM element that doesn't
> require tag splitting.

Done.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=5785ebd7acfb ***
